attributes.action: Close nurseries and schools FOR ALL due to coronavirus safety
attributes.additional_details:
We do not have protection from germs.
We can not keep children apart all day.
We have to care for these children with holding hands, cuddles, changing nappies etc..we can not ignore them.
2 year funded childrens parents are at home all day.
Pupil premium children also have parents at home.
Ehcp plan does not make parents un able to look after their own children.
Nurses and doctors can use funding for nannys in their own homes to keep social distancing possible.
We are forced to work with high anxiety when we want to protect our own families.
We want to keep safe and socially distance ourselves.
We have elderly and vunerable relatives.
We are not safe.
attributes.background: Stop making childcare workers work when there is social distancing due to the corona virus.
